casename: Rizal bin Abdul Razak v Public Prosecutor
counsel: Selva K Naidu (Naidu Mohan & Theseira) for the appellant; Jennifer Marie and Tai Wei Shyong (Deputy Public Prosecutors) for the respondent

headings.text: Applying Tang Kin Seng v Public Prosecutor [1997] 1 SLR 46, the judge was of the view that Yana's statement was only valuable as evidence of consistency.
Whether the appellant was correctly identified by Nana
Whether Dino's evidence was sufficient corroboration of Nana's identification
